main.name: Matthew Greenwell
main.description: SQL server | Web Infrastructure | Cloud + On Premise Infrastructure | C# ASP.NET Development
main.bio: I am primarily a network infrastructure specialist; I build and maintain networks for web hosting. However I'm also a full time Microsoft SQL server DBA and I work with ASP.NET applications on a daily basis. Some of the technologies I work with include IIS, MSSQL, RabbitMQ, Azure, AWS and Elastic Search.
main.aboutsite: This site is built with React and hosted in Azure. It's a work in progress and I plan to expand its functionality beyond just static content by writing a backend API.
